quizlist.question: Acoustic feedback can arise__________?
quizlist.option1: because the volume adjustment of the speaker is too high
quizlist.option2: because outside noise is amplified by the loudspeaker in the microphone
quizlist.option3: because the loudspeaker works as a microphone

quizlist.question: Squelch mode serves to suppress__________?
quizlist.option1: noise in speech-breaks in an SSB-signal
quizlist.option2: noise in absence of an FM-signal

quizlist.question: The legal type VHF-antenna has a length of__________.?
Automatic amplifier regulation is used to__________?
quizlist.option1: reduce distortion of weak incoming signals
quizlist.option2: reduce distortion of the strong incoming signal
quizlist.option3: reduce noise if there is no signal

quizlist.question: When onboard channel 16 is used for a shore radio-connection, you always work__________.?
Which wave length applies to a frequency of 2000 kHz?
Long distance communication in the HF-bands depends on__________.?
The squelch on the control panel of a VHF-sat serves to__________.?
quizlist.option1: adjust the threshold level for admitting signals and refusing noise
quizlist.option2: adjust the sound level of the signal received
quizlist.option3: adjust the proportion of atmospheric noise in receiving the spoken word

quizlist.question: The typical “daylight-frequencies” for long distance transmission are located in the__________.?
What is the recommended connection between antenna and VHF?
A VHF transmission range is mainly determined by__________.?
quizlist.option2: the right position of the squelch-adjustment

quizlist.question: A polarisation of a radio wave is determined by a__________.?
What is the maximum range of a VHF radio-set from ship to ship at sea?
What is meant by frequency.?
quizlist.option3: number of vibrations per unit of time

quizlist.question: Before a mariphone is installed on board, __________.?
quizlist.option3: a letter of registration must be applied for

quizlist.question: The sound-level of the speaker on a MF/HF radiotelephony installation is adjusted through _________?
With the squelch mode on the VHF__________?
